General.Name: Chen Ke Ming Food Manufacturing Co Ltd
General.Description: Chen Ke Ming Food Manufacturing Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of rice and flour products in China. The company provides noodles under the Chen Keming, Jin Maichu, and Laiwan Noodles brnads; flour under the Chen Keming and Five Flavor Liangcang brand names; instant food products under the Wugu Daochang and Chen Keming brands; and other products. It also offers non-fried instant noodles, fresh mixed noodles, self-heating noodles, semi-dry noodles, self-heating rice, etc. Chen Ke Ming Food Manufacturing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Changsha, China.
